titleInfo.title: Captain Luke J. Weathers and Colonel Benjamin O. Davis, Jr.

mods.abstract: "Colonel Benjamin O. Davis, Jr. return [sic] to Tuskegee Army Air Field - Colonel Davis return [sic] to TAAF to celebrate VE Day, August 18, 1945. He was introduced by Capt. Luke J. Weathers who served under his command in the 332nd Fighter Group. Platform guest [sic] left to right were Colonel Dibble, CO Tuskegee VA Hospital, Colonel Noel F. Parrish, CO TAAF, Capt. Weathers, Colonel Davis, Dr. Frederick D. Patterson, President of Tuskegee Institute, LTC Richard C. Cummings, Post Surgeon, and Major Harold C. Magoon, Master of Ceromony [sic]."

relatedItem.abstract: A collection of all things Memphis... a little bit of this, a little bit of that. The M Files is a great place to find portraits and newspaper clippings, but also so much more. As the clippings from the Memphis Information File are digitized, they will be added to The M Files, but so will the smaller manuscript collections and most of the items used to create the topical digital displays in the Memphis Room.
